Project Goal / Notes: Goal: Set up hardware and networking to run AI locally without cloud costs. Includes climate control, racks, and UPS.
Goal: Build initial AI pipeline for invoice → OCR → JSON extraction. Runs on local GPU.
Goal: Build first cross-platform mobile app for document uploads and status tracking.
Goal: Create desktop version with drag-and-drop uploads and document status.
Goal: Set up shared folder intake system before portal is live.
Goal: Sign first paying clients from personal/business connections to validate service.
Goal: Submit apps for review to make platform public and scalable.
Goal: Public release of apps; start onboarding self-service clients.
Goal: Launch reseller program targeting accountants/bookkeepers.
Goal: Enable multiple clients/partners to share same infrastructure securely.
Goal: Add compliance-specific document processing for cannabis vertical.
Goal: Allow partners to integrate uploads directly from their systems.
Goal: Let users scan receipts and invoices instantly via mobile camera.
Goal: Notify clients instantly when documents are processed or errors occur.
Goal: Give clients insights into processing volume and trends.
Goal: Add free plan to funnel self-serve users into paid tiers.
Goal: Drive mobile downloads via targeted ads to niche audiences.
Goal: Automatically sync processed data with accounting software.
Goal: Let clients search historical documents with filters.
Goal: Expand market reach to non-English speaking clients.
Goal: Hit $250k+ ARR, package platform/data for potential acquirers.
